title: The day Riot decided to make games shorter.....
body: was the day this game just started going downhill. There's no more strategy involved, Riot encourages snowballing, champ selection probably uses about 10% of the total amount of champions, and of course, games are usually 20 minutes or less. For the people that were bringing up the issue of "games being too long", unless Riot decided this on their own in which I hope not, you were probably the worst players on the Rift. The ones who couldn't position correctly in a teamfight, or couldn't manage objectives correctly. Unless Riot reverts their changes in order to "make games faster", these 2 second teamfights and the insta blowing up of anyone anytime will always occur.

replies.body: It's weird back in S3/4 they were trying to stop snowballing, now they brought it back.
It's because people complained about "boring" 50 minute games happening all the time. Now the same people want the games longer again. I wish The would make up their minds.

>
> It's because people complained about "boring" 50 minute games happening all the time. Now the same people want the games longer again. I wish The would make up their minds.

Pretty sure those people are having a blast playing Yasuo. Riven, Camille etc.
It's different people complaining. Those that don't like playing this "meta".

The thing is, riot is listening to the community. If the community rejects a change, then riot tries to fix it (indirectly of course). 

During the tank meta, people complained games were too long (45 min avg) and that nobody was dying fast enough. Now, season 6 just ended and tanks are being killed in record time. 

We caused this.

Everyone has valuable input, I just don't want the feeling of the game being over by 10-15 minutes when you see a 5-0 adc or 6-2 jungle. I just don't understand why people hated the 45 minute games. Those seemed the most tense and rewarding if you made a good play or stole an objective. Now, objectives don't even mean shit. Get one person fed as fuck and good luck stopping them. A Riven, with todays cd buffs, can easily 1v3 or 1v4 a team is she has a + 4-5 rating.

League is the FPS of the DoTA clone world.  Mechanics and reaction > macro play.  You don't need to to think to micro your way to diamond with Yasuo and its why he'll never be changed, Riot wants the game to be like this.  They want you to get a massive boner every time you use yet another moblity creeped ability, they want you to make a montage of every champ that can jump 90 thousand times in the span of 15 seconds, they want you to scream at the top of your lungs DID U SE DAT OUTPLAY OMGUR when you play this game.  Things like actually winning a game get in the way of these fantasies which is why towers and objectives are a joke and mobility/damage/shield creep are in full throttle.

i think riot should create a gamemode thats just a longer version of SR giving towers and minions more hp and lowering XP gain 
so the games can last 40 mins to an hour.
And make it a permanent mode with it's only queue being ranked. Yes please.
